Articles.Content: flawless launch. real sense of pride watching these launches! ironic, as I am watching I am building a new JEM robotic arm...
Did not watch...was getting ready for,school!

it should be on youtube probably.

in the live chat comments section there were ALOT of ksp references lol

Jebediah and mechjeb etc

- - - Updated - - -

Started and finished the JEM arm tonight.

will upload shortly

thanks to TrooperMNG we have new textures for the DreamChaser. Looks amazing!

Omg! That is amazing. Almost makesme,want to use dreamchaser (i'm PROBABLY chasing dreams, though) (sorry, bad pun!)

new release is up on github.

includes new arm and removal of RO configs (separate download)

- - - Updated - - -

made a basic RO config for the dreamer. will complete it tomorrow
Cool! I'll download and try again when i get home later

Are the modules under the zvezda and zarya + Node 3 and the S-0 doenst fit on correctly. 

And the ISS docking ports stoped working for me after i connected Destiny to node 1

*Are the modules under the zvezda and zarya + Node 3 in the making?*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-19T22:29:31Z" title="08/19/2015 10:29  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 19, 2015</time> by Quantum\_Cookie**

> 
> i updated to your last update and now the Z-0 fits on the destiny module
> *Are the modules under the zvezda and zarya + Node 3 in the making?*

Do You mean there are currently no modules in the iss pack? 

If it means making new ones then yes I can make them.

Let me know what they are and I can research

> 
> Do You mean there are currently no modules in the iss pack? 
> If it means making new ones then yes I can make them.
> 
> Let me know what they are and I can research

![VroIRxq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VroIRxq.jpg)

the ones in the red circels

RM is actually the *Rassvet* module, and I use the *MIR Crystal* as stand-in for the *Nauka* (MLM) module. Also, even though you didn't indicate it, DC1 is the *Poisk* module. (It's twin, *Pirs*, is attached where the *Nauka* module will be. It will became the first module to be detached and allowed to burn up. That was supposed to happen last year, but has been delayed until 2017. <per wikipedia="" article.="">)</per>

Node 3 is a copy of Node 2. MPLM is the *Leonardo* module.

And how does one add the JEM RMS pieces to the arm control panel? I just attached the first two pieces on orbit...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-20T02:05:52Z" title="08/20/2015 02:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 20, 2015</time> by AdmiralSirJohn**
Make that three pieces.

> > RM is actually the *Rassvet* module, and I use the *MIR Crystal* as stand-in for the *Nauka* (MLM) module. Also, even though you didn't indicate it, DC1 is the *Poisk* module. (It's twin, *Pirs*, is attached where the *Nauka* module will be. It will became the first module to be detached and allowed to burn up. That was supposed to happen last year, but has been delayed until 2017. )

Node 3 is a copy of Node 2. MPLM is the Leonardo module.

And how does one add the JEM RMS pieces to the arm control panel? I just attached the first two pieces on orbit...

 How to attach the arm in orbit? I was thinking load the craft file (prebuilt) and send it up complete then use KAS mod to attach it maybe? Not sure. Or connect it to the jem before sending it up... I have not tried sorry

Unfortunately, I can't get the complete arm into KIS containers. It only goes in parts. And I'd have to undock the existing JEM structure to launch it pre-attached.

Really, I'm just looking for how to add the joints to the control panel as I build the arm in orbit... or can that only be done in the VAB?
Maybe one of the others can answer that.

What if I made the jem a kis container. Send it up inside it?

- - - Updated - - -

Since your jem is already in place, could you send it up complete inside a rocket?

The KIS container won't allow for pre-built components. It only accepts individual pieces.

I've got the pieces already in orbit. I just need a way to control them once assembled.

- - - Updated - - -

I have two pieces left to attach... if I can keep Bob from floating away, that is...

Issue with Iss: Unity (node 1) and Harmony/Tranquility (node 2-3) models are inverted. Unity is smaller than Harmony and Tranquility, and in your pack it's bigger. 

This should be the correct configuration

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/FRrOb)

with current node 1 as Harmony/Tranquility and Node 2/3 as Unity. But they both need retexturing, as node 2/3 has "Unity" written on it and Node 1 doesn't have "Unity" written on it. 

Photos for reference: ("Unity" should be written close to PMA and Zarya, with the berthing ports in the other half of the module)

![Zarya_and_Unity_Artist_s_view_node_full_image_2.jpg](http://www.esa.int/var/esa/storage/images/esa_multimedia/images/2001/11/zarya_and_unity_artist_s_view/9126003-5-eng-GB/Zarya_and_Unity_Artist_s_view_node_full_image_2.jpg)

![AZ%20Produced%20Unity%20Embelm%20on%20First%20US%20Module%20of%20International%20Space%20Station%20Attached%20to%20Russian%20Zarya%20Control%20Module%20Against%20Earth](http://www.logosinspace.com/images/NASA-Images/Unity%20Emblem/AZ%20Produced%20Unity%20Embelm%20on%20First%20US%20Module%20of%20International%20Space%20Station%20Attached%20to%20Russian%20Zarya%20Control%20Module%20Against%20Earth)

Another thing: I would really like an assembly guide, especially for the truss sections. I know, as an ISS enthusiast, the chronology of the modules, but I need a guide to assembly your model, as when I try to build it some pieces seem badly positioned. For example, s0 structures are floating in the air, when I come back home i'll post screenshots

KSP seems to stop loading at Mir\_core\_Module. I have installed the [patch](https://www.dropbox.com/s/vvpyhz03jvi9flz/RealismOverhaul.zip?dl=0)

[Screenshot of the debug menu](http://i.imgur.com/cKK5iFQ.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-20T14:55:52Z" title="08/20/2015 02:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 20, 2015</time> by Shurikeeen**

this still happens?

remove the gamedata/realism overhaul folder from your game please if your not using the full realism overhaul mod.

infact this is no longer part of the mod and must be downloaded separate for RO users ONLY
